mapper.sql: property_id, pro_name, img_path, description, parent_id, created, updated, status
mapper.insert: insert into property (property_id, pro_name, img_path, description, parent_id, created, updated, status) values (#{propertyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into property
property_id,

description,
parent_id,
created,
updated,
status,

mapper.update:
update property
pro_name = #{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
img_path = #{imgPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where property_id = #{propertyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
